column2: "Honestly, killer, it kinda seems like I'm wastin' your time just by asking, but..."
"You know how to break through those guys' defenses, right? When I do it, it takes me forever."
"I mean, I can take 'em down my way, but if I work some of your tactics into the mix..."
"Doing that'll create a way better strategy, right?"
"We can learn from each other for a change, huh? Help me out, here!"
